services: We consider training as one of the important part in our procedure and services as with good operation and safety training you can avoid big disasters in our time.
We host a well developed training center with well designed rig for performing on-site bolting & machining jobs, providing hands on training.
Our trainer’s are more than 25+ years of experience in the designated field of operations.
We are approved by ECITB (British) & API-U (American)courses for on-site bolting procedures & techniques.
